page.title: 06POLICING IN LONGTOWN.
page.content: LONGTOWN POLICE STATION is the section headquarters for the districts of Roadhead,Smithfield,Rockcliffe and Metal Bridge.Crime in this area is not sophisticated with burglary,petty theft and poaching being the most common.Poaching ranges from rabbits to salmon.There is no evidence of drug abuse.Community policing is given a high priority.Police aim to be known on first name terms.Policemen visit schools in connection with cycling proficiency testing,and also give informative talks.Each policeman uses a car to cover his area,which has a radio link with Carleton Police H.Q. and also can call up the Police National Computer at Hendon,for information concerning vehicle records etc.The farming community receive visits in respect of licenses for the movement of stock and gun licenses.
